articles.title: Advanced Root Canal Techniques: A Clinical Approach
articles.excerpt: Exploring modern endodontic approaches for complex root canal cases with detailed step-by-step methodology and clinical outcomes.
articles.content:
Introduction

Endodontic treatment has evolved significantly with advances in technology and techniques. This comprehensive guide explores evidence-based approaches to complex root canal cases.

Clinical Examination

  • Comprehensive medical and dental history
  • Visual and tactile examination
  • Percussion and palpation tests
  • Thermal and electric pulp testing
articles.author: Dr. Roitman

articles.title: Managing Complex Endodontic Cases
articles.excerpt: Professional insights into handling challenging endodontic procedures with confidence and precision.
articles.content:
Understanding Complexity

Complex endodontic cases require systematic approach and advanced techniques.

Key Strategies

  • Proper case selection
  • Advanced imaging techniques
  • Specialized instrumentation
articles.author: Dr. Roitman
